reviewText: kataklysm for the win love this band now just visit the mitten for a concert!!!!
I love this dvd, I love these band too. I wanna watch this dvd and I hope I will be great
This dvd is so amazing you cant stop watching it i just got heavens venom cd and it blew my mind anything by these boys will rock you socks off TRUST ME

This dvd is awesome.. the concert footage is great quality... the videos are good... and the biography interviews are very interesting... very good dvd... the only thing i got against it is the concert is only about 40 min or so... They have enough good songs to go for at least an hour and 20 min... thats my only complaint is that they could have has better songs... if you like kataklysm get this.. if you are a fan of metal get this!..
Great dvd FULL of live footage and their history. They did a quality job with this. Money well spent. This is one of the best death metal bands going today.
